I used the "Hugo" framework to create this website. I also used the "Toha" theme for Hugo.

The website is hosted on GitHub Pages.

There is a deploy.sh script in the root of the repository that builds the website and pushes the changes generated to the reopository's master branch, which is used by GitHub Pages to serve the website.

Answer all questions in less than 1000 characters, and words of no more than 12 characters.
